Collector Gutenhagen: When I first came here, these barracks were full of Dwarves... Now they're deserted! That is, of course, except for Yumi and me! Yumi's on some sort or research mission, and I can't just leave her alone! You look like a strong-enough fellow... Are you looking for work?
